snippet.title: Synth Riders [Behind The Scenes] - Two-Year Anniversary: The Story So Far
snippet.description:
Two years since the Early Access release and almost three years into the development, we reflect on the way in which the game has grown and changed.  We would never make it this far without our Community.  Synth Riders truly is your game - and this video is from us to you.

--------------------------------------
Synth Riders is available for Quest/Oculus, Steam & PSVR: http://bit.ly/playsr
Join the Synth Riders Discord Community: http://discord.synthridersvr.com/
Official website: https://synthridersvr.com/

Follow Synth Riders:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/synthridersvr
Facebook: http://fb.me/synthridersvr
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/synthridersvr/
